title: Bonus Episode - Raekwon + Shaka Senghor
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Raekwon sits down with the Ebro in the Morning to discuss his new collaboration with Diadora, and Foot Locker: Community Linx, his new book 'From Staircase to Stage: The Story of Raekwon and the Wu-Tang', the rumored 'Purple Tape' Documentary, his opinion on his portrayal on the Hulu series, 'Wu-Tang: An American Saga', plans for a new album and more! 

Plus New York Times Best Selling author, speaker, and activist Shaka Senghor shares his inspiring story from being in prison to getting a second chance to influence and motivate others like him through his experience and journey!

All that and more on Hot 97! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

description:
